Title: Relates to the revocation or reissuance of licenses; repealer
Summary: Relates to the revocation and reissuance of licenses.
LawCode: Rpld §1193 sub 2 ¶(b) sub¶ 12, amd §§1193 & 511, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the revocation and the reissuance of licenses; and to repeal subparagraph 12 of paragraph (b) of subdivision 2 of section 1193 of such law, relating to permanent revocation
